query:
-- First, ensure we have time periods
INSERT INTO timePeriods (periodDate, month, year, quarter, periodName, createdAt) VALUES
('2025-12-01', 12, 2025, 4, '2025-12', NOW()),
('2026-01-01', 1, 2026, 1, '2026-01', NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE periodName=VALUES(periodName);

-- Insert AR Aging data
INSERT INTO arAging (locationId, customerId, periodId, amount0_30, amount31_60, amount61_90, amount90_plus, totalAR, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
(1, 1, 1, 45000, 0, 0, 0, 45000, NOW(), NOW()),
(2, 2, 1, 0, 120000, 0, 0, 120000, NOW(), NOW()),
(3, 3, 1, 0, 0, 78000, 0, 78000, NOW(), NOW()),
(4, 1, 1, 56000, 0, 0, 0, 56000, NOW(), NOW()),
(1, 4, 1, 0, 0, 0, 210000, 210000, NOW(), NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE totalAR=VALUES(totalAR);
command:

('2025-12-01', 12, 2025, 4, '2025-12', NOW()),
('2026-01-01', 1, 2026, 1, '2026-01', NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE periodName=VALUES(periodName);

-- Insert AR Aging data
INSERT INTO arAging (locationId, customerId, periodId, amount0_30, amount31_60, amount61_90, amount90_plus, totalAR, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES
(1, 1, 1, 45000, 0, 0, 0, 45000, NOW(), NOW()),
(2, 2, 1, 0, 120000, 0, 0, 120000, NOW(), NOW()),
(3, 3, 1, 0, 0, 78000, 0, 78000, NOW(), NOW()),
(4, 1, 1, 56000, 0, 0, 0, 56000, NOW(), NOW()),
(1, 4, 1, 0, 0, 0, 210000, 210000, NOW(), NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE totalAR=VALUES(totalAR);
